tests.test:
mv: file (absolute path) to file (absolute path)
-fs NAMENODE -touchz TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file1 -fs NAMENODE -mv TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file1 TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file2 -fs NAMENODE -ls TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file*
-fs NAMENODE -rm TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file2 :
RegexpComparator ^-rw-r--r--( )*1( )*[a-z]*( )*supergroup( )*0( )*[0-9]{4,}-[0-9]{2,}-[0-9]{2,} [0-9]{2,}:[0-9]{2,}( )*TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file2
RegexpComparator ^-rw-r--r--( )*1( )*[a-z]*( )*supergroup( )*0( )*[0-9]{4,}-[0-9]{2,}-[0-9]{2,} [0-9]{2,}:[0-9]{2,}( )*TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file[^1]

mv: file (absolute path) to directory (absolute path); keep the same name at the destination [ TIED to previous test ]

comparator.expected-output: ls: `TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file1': No such file or directory

comparator.expected-output: ls: `TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file1': No such file or directory

RegexpComparator ^-rw-r--r--( )*1( )*[a-z]*( )*supergroup( )*0( )*[0-9]{4,}-[0-9]{2,}-[0-9]{2,} [0-9]{2,}:[0-9]{2,}( )*HCFS_SCHEME//TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file2
RegexpComparator ^-rw-r--r--( )*1( )*[a-z]*( )*supergroup( )*0( )*[0-9]{4,}-[0-9]{2,}-[0-9]{2,} [0-9]{2,}:[0-9]{2,}( )*HCFS_SCHEME//TEST_DIR_ABSOLUTE/file[^1]
